text: Brinsley Shaw (1876–1931) was an American stage and film actor of the silent era.Katchmer p.348 ==Selected filmography== * Across the Plains (1911) * The Wolf of Debt (1915) * A Prince in a Pawnshop (1916) * An Enemy to the King (1916) * Arsene Lupin (1917) * The Black Gate (1919) * Hearts Are Trumps (1920) * A Trip to Paradise (1921) * The Barefoot Boy (1923) * Stepping Lively (1924) * Jimmie's Millions (1925) * Before Midnight (1925) * Bucking the Truth (1926) ==References== ==Bibliography== * George A. Katchmer. A Biographical Dictionary of Silent Film Western Actors and Actresses. McFarland, 2009. ==External links== * Category:1876 births Category:1931 deaths Category:American male film actors Category:People from New York City
title: Brinsley Shaw
